subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] White Noise, Pink Noise, Brown/Red Noise
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Cool Aaron thanks for the link. I mostly use water sounds from the tank but I will check it out.

Misty


--- On Tue, 7/29/08, kolrone <a.cronk@...> wrote:

> From: kolrone <a.cronk@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] White Noise, Pink Noise, Brown/Red Noise
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Tuesday, July 29, 2008, 10:23 PM
> I found a site that lets you stream and download background
> noise such
> as white, pink, and brown/red noise. It's
> http://simplynoise.com/ I
> figured some people may be able to use this if you
> don't feel like
> making your own.
> 
> -Aaron
